full_title: Rock Me Gently by Andy Kim
title: Rock Me Gently
lyrics:
5 ContributorsRock Me Gently LyricsAin't it good
Ain't it right
That you are with me here tonight

The music playing
Our bodies swaying in time
(In time, in time, in time)

Touching you
So warm and tender
Lord, I feel such a sweet surrender
Beautiful is the dream that makes you mine

Take it easy

That I have never been
Loved like this before

Rock me gently

Take it easy
Don't you know
That I have never been
Loved like this before

I see a trace of love

I need you, honey
I love you so
You were made for me by the stars above

That I have never been loved like this before

Don't you know
That I have never been Loved like this before
